 II. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁלָה‎</span>] **verb** ==draw out, extract== (si vera lectio; =<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁלַל‎</span>; Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> (e.g. [[Exod.2.10|Exod 2:10]]), [[BDB#Sept|ᵑ7]]<sup>**Jer**</sup> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁלִי‎</span> (e.g. [[Lev.11.17|Lev 11:17]])); — 

**Qal** ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular with apocope ([[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:109k»§ 109k</sup>) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כִי וֵ֫שֶׁל אֱלוֺהַּ נַפְשׁוֺ‎</span> [[Job.27.8|Job 27:8]] ([[BDB#De|De]]); &lt; read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָשֹׁל‎</span>, or <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִשּׁל‎</span> (√ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁלל‎</span>) [[BDB#Di|Di]]; Schnurrer [[BDB#We|We]] [[BDB#Siegf|Siegf]] [[BDB#Bu|Bu]] [[BDB#Du|Du]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִשְׁאַל‎</span> ***demandeth***; [[BDB#Perles|Perles]]<sup>Anal. 48</sup> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִשָּׂא אֶלאֱֿלוֺהַּ‎</span>.
